tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların cana yakın olmasını beklemeyin. Nasıl olunduğunu gösterin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir iyilik, ne kadar küçük olursa olsun, boşa gitmez.
tr_quotes.author: Aesop

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, ehlileştirilmiş ihtirastır.
tr_quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada sadece sevinç olsaydı, asla cesur ve sabırlı olmayı öğrenemezdik.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar küçük olursa olsun hiçbir iyilik boşa gitmez.
tr_quotes.author: Aesop

tr_quotes.quote: Yazmak iyidir, ama düşünmek daha iyi; akıllılık iyidir, ama sabretmek daha iyi.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Allah sabredenlerle beraberdir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Sabırda musibet, hüzün ve telaşta menfaat yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ebubekir

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, imanın yarısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Hadis-i Şerif

tr_quotes.quote: Ehil olmayanlara sabretmek, ehil olanları parlatır
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Acele şeytan hilesidir, sabır ve tedbir Allah lütfu
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Sabırlı kuş, bütün kuşlardan daha iyi uçar
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Çalınan her kapı açılsaydı, ümidin, sabrın ve isteğin derecesi anlaşılmazdı.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır öyle bir ip ki sen kopacak sanırsın; o gittikçe güçlenir. Sen bitecek sanırsın; o gittikçe çoğalır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır suskunluk değil, işitilmeyen feryattır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabretmeyi bilmiyorsan baştan kaybetmişsindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğrular her zaman canını acıtacaktır. Her zaman duymasaydım, bilmeseydim keşke dersin ama duyacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Beklemesini becerenin, her şey ayağına gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, erdemin cesaretidir.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard de Saint Pierre

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, iman yüzünden baş tacı olur. Bundan dolayıdır ki sabrı olmayanın imanı da yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Hadis-i Şerif

tr_quotes.quote: Beklediğim günlere elbet bir gün değecek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Beklemeyi bilen insan, her şeyi elde edebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada bela olmasa dünyanın tadı olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Mahmut Ustaosmanoğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Sabredin! Hüzünsüz bir neşe ve darlıksız bir bolluk olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Abdülkadir Geylani

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, ağrıları dindiren acı bir ot gibidir. Hem can yakar hem de tedavi eder.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır boyun eğmek değildir. Sabır, mücadele etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, kuvvetin bir başka adıdır.
tr_quotes.author: E. B. Browding

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır acıdır; ama meyvesi tatlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız basit şeyleri tam ve mükemmel yapmaya sabırları olan insanlar, güç şeyleri kolaylıkla öğrenme becerisini kazanabilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada sadece sevinç olsaydı, cesur ve sabırlı olmayı asla öğrenemezdik.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, ağrıları dindiren acı bir ot gibidir. Hem can yakar hem de tedavi eder.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük başarıların sahipleri, küçük işleri titizlikle yapabilme sabrını gösteren kişilerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Bir öfke anında sabır gösterirsen, yüz gün üzüntü çekmekten kurtulursun.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Özdeyişi

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır boyun eğmek değildir. Sabır, mücadele etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Önceden sabrederdim, şimdi uzaklaşıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kıymet bilmeyen insanlarla sınanıyoruz, sabırda yorgun artık.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır suskunluk değil,işitilmeyen feryattır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kimi sabrından susar, kimi saygısından, kimisi de sevgisinden.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne istediğini bilen insanların, acelesi yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, en kutlu hediye olduğu için bütün nifakçıları, kötü niyetli kişileri yener.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır kara bir dikeni yutmak, diken içini parçalayıp geçerken de hiç ses çıkarmamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızca ateşli bir sabır ulaştırır bizi muhteşem bir mutluluğun kapısına.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, yükün altına girip şikayet etmemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır; selamet ve saadet evinin anahtarı ve her musibetin ilacıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabrın en büyüğü, Allah’ın emir ve yasaklarına karşı sabretmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir öfke anında sabır gösterirsen, yüz gün üzüntü çekmekten kurtulursun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İlim üç şeydir: Zikreden dil, şükreden kalp, sabreden beden.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, sıkıntının anahtarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır bütün belaları gönül rahatlığıyla karşılamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır ve dua müminin silahıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her söz için doğruluk, her doğruluk için iş, her iş için de sabır gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish
en_quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

en_quotes.quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: I am blessed to be surrounded by the people I love. I thank them for their patience and grace
en_quotes.author: Matt Lauer

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes things aren't clear right away. That's where you need to be patient and persevere and see where things lead
en_quotes.author: Mary Pierce

en_quotes.quote: The more you know yourself, the more patience you have for what you see in others
en_quotes.author: Erik Erikson

en_quotes.quote: Be patient. Patience is the mother of all virtues
en_quotes.author: Hrithik Roshan

en_quotes.quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Beware the fury of a patient man
en_quotes.author: John Dryden

en_quotes.quote: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance
en_quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

en_quotes.quote: Tolerance, compromise, understanding, acceptance, patience - I want those all to be very sharp tools in my shed
en_quotes.author: CeeLo Green

en_quotes.quote: I am patient with stupidity but not with those who are proud of it
en_quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

en_quotes.quote: Genius is patience
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: When things begin accelerating wildly out of control, sometimes patience is the only answer. Press pause
en_quotes.author: Douglas Rushkoff

en_quotes.quote: Meekness: Uncommon patience in planning a revenge that is worth while
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Patience has its limits, take it too far and it's cowardice
en_quotes.author: Holbrook Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Wise to resolve, and patient to perform
en_quotes.author: Homer

en_quotes.quote: Have patience with all things, But, first of all with yourself
en_quotes.author: Saint Francis de Sales

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the art of hoping
en_quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers

en_quotes.quote: The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: Only those who have patience to do simple things perfectly ever acquire the skill to do difficult things easily
en_quotes.author: James J. Corbett

en_quotes.quote: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy
en_quotes.author: Saadi

en_quotes.quote: Endurance is patience concentrated
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the secret to good food
en_quotes.author: Gail Simmons

en_quotes.quote: The strong manly ones in life are those who understand the meaning of the word patience
en_quotes.author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

en_quotes.quote: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence
en_quotes.author: Hal Borland

en_quotes.quote: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience
en_quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience
en_quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

en_quotes.quote: How poor are they that have not patience! What wound did ever heal but by degrees?
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: He that can have patience can have what he will
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: A man who is a master of patience is master of everything else
en_quotes.author: George Savile

en_quotes.quote: Abused patience turns to fury
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: No, I will be the pattern of all patience; I will say nothing
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: The very important thing you should have is patience
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious
en_quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the ability to idle your motor when you feel like stripping your gears
en_quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Gardeners are good at nurturing, and they have a great quality of patience, they're tender. They have to be persistent
en_quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

en_quotes.quote: God always has patience
en_quotes.author: Pope Francis

en_quotes.quote: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown
en_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: Gardening is a working meditation for me. It helps me remember process, and it helps me remember patience
en_quotes.author: Lizz Wright

en_quotes.quote: Patience has its limits. Take it too far, and it's cowardice
en_quotes.author: George Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Patience pays off
en_quotes.author: Mayte Garcia

en_quotes.quote: A monk's extraordinary patience can be a hindrance to desperate decision-making
en_quotes.author: Harsha Bhogle

en_quotes.quote: Patience is key for getting over a breakup. That, and trailing off your interaction after the breakup
en_quotes.author: Drake

en_quotes.quote: Who ever is out of patience is out of possession of their soul
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Heaven grant us patience with a man in love
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: Patience is sorrow's salve
en_quotes.author: Charles Churchill

en_quotes.quote: My three Ps: passion, patience, perseverance. You have to do this if you've got to be a filmmaker
en_quotes.author: Robert Wise

en_quotes.quote: Bear patiently with a rival
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Dating someone on the opposite end of the happy spectrum teaches you an incredible amount of patience
en_quotes.author: Chris Pine

en_quotes.quote: The principle part of faith is patience
en_quotes.author: George MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: One problem with age is that patience begins to ebb
en_quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

en_quotes.quote: The test of good manners is to be patient with the bad ones
en_quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

en_quotes.quote: Alcohol gives you infinite patience for stupidity
en_quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work, 23 or 24 hours a day. And there is no substitute for patience and acceptance
en_quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

en_quotes.quote: I have no patience for wasting time
en_quotes.author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Humility is attentive patience
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: Our patience will achieve more than our force
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Patience is a virtue; virtue is a grace
en_quotes.author: Jacob Rees-Mogg

en_quotes.quote: I make really good pasta sauce. The secret to getting it right is just patience and love
en_quotes.author: Banks

en_quotes.quote: I'm patient
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: If I have done the public any service, it is due to my patient thought
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: Hope is patience with the lamp lit
en_quotes.author: Tertullian

en_quotes.quote: The only thing you have to have is patience and an attitude that you aren't ever going to give up
en_quotes.author: Shawn Michaels

en_quotes.quote: It is impossible to practice parliamentary politics without having patience, decency, politeness and courtesy
en_quotes.author: Khaleda Zia

en_quotes.quote: To learn patience is not to rebel against every hardship
en_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

en_quotes.quote: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Patience, the beggar's virtue, shall find no harbor here
en_quotes.author: Philip Massinger

en_quotes.quote: Genius is eternal patience
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: My dad said to me, 'Work hard and be patient.' It was the best advice he ever gave me. You have to put the hours in
en_quotes.author: Simon Cowell

en_quotes.quote: Writing is good, thinking is better. Cleverness is good, patience is better
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: Teach us, O Lord, the disciplines of patience, for to wait is often harder than to work
en_quotes.author: Peter Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Patience, n. A minor form of dispair, disguised as a virtue
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Basically, discipline, effort, patience and courage are hugely important core values for kids to grow up embracing
en_quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

en_quotes.quote: Everyone ought to bear patiently the results of his own conduct
en_quotes.author: Phaedrus

en_quotes.quote: Patience means restraining one's inclinations
en_quotes.author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

en_quotes.quote: With care and patience, people may accomplish things which, to an indolent person, would appear impossible
en_quotes.author: Dorothea Dix

en_quotes.quote: I'm a peace-maker, I can fit into a lot of situations. I'm pretty easygoing. I have a lot of patience
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

en_quotes.quote: I have no patience with dinosaurs
en_quotes.author: Adam West

en_quotes.quote: I've always been in awe of filmmakers and their patience in realizing their vision because I could never do that
en_quotes.author: Mike Patton

en_quotes.quote: I can imagine few things more trying to the patience than the long wasted days of waiting
en_quotes.author: Robert Falcon Scott

en_quotes.quote: No, you're not allowed to be bossy when you're married. You have to learn compromise, and compassion and patience
en_quotes.author: Star Jones

en_quotes.quote: I'm patient with crossword puzzles and the most impatient golfer
en_quotes.author: Brett Hull

en_quotes.quote: Right-wing extremism is all about patience. That is, until it makes its move, and then it is sudden and explosive
en_quotes.author: Steven Weber

en_quotes.quote: If I am right about the big picture, I will be rewarded for my patience
en_quotes.author: Thomas Kaplan

en_quotes.quote: I like playing. I wouldn't be a good coach. I don't have the patience to be a coach
en_quotes.author: Tom Brady

en_quotes.quote: I don't have the patience to be a non-creator
en_quotes.author: Virgil Abloh

en_quotes.quote: The Lord, Jesus Christ, is our perfect example of patience
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: Patience was not my strong point
en_quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

en_quotes.quote: Golf is all about patience - one tournament is four days long, 18 holes a day
en_quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

en_quotes.quote: Hopelessness has surprised me with patience
en_quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

en_quotes.quote: Endurance is the crowning quality, And patience all the passion of great hearts
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: Find patience in the breath of life
en_quotes.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

en_quotes.quote: He who rides the sea of the Nile must have sails woven of patience
en_quotes.author: William Golding

en_quotes.quote: We are telling the American people to have patience, courage, resolve and determination
en_quotes.author: Muammar al-Gaddafi

en_quotes.quote: You have to find the peace and patience within yourself to be a model and an example to others and not judge
en_quotes.author: Judith Light

en_quotes.quote: I think I have more patience now than I did in the past
en_quotes.author: T. Boone Pickens

en_quotes.quote: An impatient person plays differently than a more patient person
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

en_quotes.quote: The biggest thing I possess is infinite patience. Once you are patient, things fall in place
en_quotes.author: Mohammad Azharuddin

en_quotes.quote: I think God's really blessed me with patience. I'm good with a lot of things going on at once
en_quotes.author: Niki Taylor

en_quotes.quote: You have to have patience to be a legislator
en_quotes.author: Gene Green

en_quotes.quote: It's a war of attrition. If you have patience and a modicum of faith in yourself your chances are not too bad
en_quotes.author: Julie Bowen

en_quotes.quote: There comes a time when you have to exercise patience
en_quotes.author: Columbus Short

en_quotes.quote: I've been called Mr. Patient Money because I have the patience to work through challenging circumstances
en_quotes.author: N. Murray Edwards

en_quotes.quote: I have not the smarts or patience for political office
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: We have no patience with other people's vanity because it is offensive to our own
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: It takes patience to appreciate domestic bliss; volatile spirits prefer unhappiness
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: Let him that hath no power of patience retire within himself, though even there he will have to put up with himself
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: The one thing about the business of entertainment is that you have to learn patience
en_quotes.author: Kevin Hart

en_quotes.quote: All commend patience, but none can endure to suffer
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: I have declared that patience is never more than patient. I too have declared, that I who am not patient am patient
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: I have all the patience in the world about Sirens. For me it's not a Grateful Dead project, it's a Me project
en_quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

en_quotes.quote: Patience with family members and others who are close to us is vital for us to have happy homes
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: A healthy male adult bore consumes each year one and a half times his own weight in other people's patience
en_quotes.author: John Updike

en_quotes.quote: No one thought the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight would happen, but I had patience
en_quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

en_quotes.quote: All men commend patience, although few are willing to practice it
en_quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

en_quotes.quote: Everyone is bound to bear patiently the results of his own example
en_quotes.author: Phaedrus

en_quotes.quote: Writing is boring, very boring, and it takes so much patience
en_quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

en_quotes.quote: The difference between rearing a child in your 20s and one in your 50s is one of patience
en_quotes.author: Iman

en_quotes.quote: You've got to be able to let things roll off your back, and you've got to have some patience
en_quotes.author: Brooks Koepka

en_quotes.quote: I think every war certainly wears on national will and national patience, particularly a counterinsurgency
en_quotes.author: Stanley A. McChrystal

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the most necessary quality for business, many a man would rather you heard his story than grant his request
en_quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

en_quotes.quote: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience
en_quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

en_quotes.quote: The practice of patience in crafting and process is a virtue that needs to come back
en_quotes.author: Zac Posen

en_quotes.quote: Patience, discipline - giving everything on court... This is what I'm trying to bring in every single match
en_quotes.author: Angelique Kerber

en_quotes.quote: Men need to learn how to deal with women with strength and patience - this is love
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lee Peterson

en_quotes.quote: The best thing Jay-Z ever taught me was patience
en_quotes.author: Rita Ora

en_quotes.quote: Lack of pep is often mistaken for patience
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Horses teach you patience and how to do things the right way so you can get the right result
en_quotes.author: Lyle Lovett

en_quotes.quote: The lions taught me photography. They taught me patience and the sense of beauty, a beauty that penetrates you
en_quotes.author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand

en_quotes.quote: I like to take my own time, and I don't like to rush. I do take time, and I have patience
en_quotes.author: Nargis Fakhri

en_quotes.quote: Face-to-face conversation unfolds slowly. It teaches patience
en_quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

en_quotes.quote: Temperamentally I'm not a natural producer, because I don't have the patience
en_quotes.author: Damian Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I've never had the patience of a teacher
en_quotes.author: Josh Turner

en_quotes.quote: Learning patience was not an easy lesson
en_quotes.author: Michael Douglas

en_quotes.quote: I think patience is a skill and I wish I had it
en_quotes.author: David Duchovny

en_quotes.quote: There are very few things that I have any patience for that are not at least a little bit humorous
en_quotes.author: Elif Batuman

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the best medicine
en_quotes.author: John Florio

en_quotes.quote: A perfect chutney needs patience. If you are cooking it, cook it on a low flame; the flavors come out the best that way
en_quotes.author: Maneet Chauhan

en_quotes.quote: My advice to someone to follow in my footsteps is to have patience. I've been doing this for twelve years
en_quotes.author: Christina Milian

en_quotes.quote: If I could have one prayer answered, I would pray for patience. I move so fast sometimes. I try to slow down
en_quotes.author: Debra Winger

en_quotes.quote: Thank God my parents had an abundance of patience
en_quotes.author: Lexa Doig

en_quotes.quote: Because I have so many brothers and sisters, I think I'm able to have a certain patience
en_quotes.author: Rza

en_quotes.quote: When I have a job to do, time means nothing. I lose patience with people who work on a clock
en_quotes.author: Don Cornelius

en_quotes.quote: I kind of feel like... I have a slower instinct than most live-action directors, but I have more patience
en_quotes.author: Pete Docter

en_quotes.quote: The biggest challenge, I think for any new artist, is patience
en_quotes.author: Brett Eldredge

en_quotes.quote: I will exercise patience and will provide all facts to the general public
en_quotes.author: Yingluck Shinawatra

en_quotes.quote: I tolerate lots of people I have no patience or respect for. Then, as soon as I can, I rat on them
en_quotes.author: Andre Aciman

en_quotes.quote: I still have to work on patience
en_quotes.author: Robert Mueller

en_quotes.quote: I have no patience at all
en_quotes.author: Alan Sugar

en_quotes.quote: I wish I had more patience
en_quotes.author: Toni Collette

en_quotes.quote: People need patience. It takes time to build a brand
en_quotes.author: Carmen Busquets

en_quotes.quote: Patience is a virtue in life, of course, but it's not something we F1 people have too much of
en_quotes.author: Niki Lauda

en_quotes.quote: I don't have a lot of patience for movies that aren't cleanly told
en_quotes.author: Jon Favreau

en_quotes.quote: For some reason, every time I get a little bit under the weather, I've got zero patience
en_quotes.author: Jason Day

en_quotes.quote: I've got to really try and manage my patience out there
en_quotes.author: Jason Day

en_quotes.quote: I've always admired teachers for their patience and purpose in choosing their profession
en_quotes.author: Eve Arden

en_quotes.quote: I know one of the reasons God gave me kids was to test my patience
en_quotes.author: Faith Hill

en_quotes.quote: One fear setting on filmmakers is that the audience no longer has any patience. They want things to constantly move
en_quotes.author: Farhan Akhtar

en_quotes.quote: There are very little things in this life I cannot afford and patience is one of them
en_quotes.author: Larry Hagman

en_quotes.quote: Never a tear bedims the eye that time and patience will not dry
en_quotes.author: Bret Harte

en_quotes.quote: I don't think I have the ability or patience to teach badminton to others
en_quotes.author: Saina Nehwal

en_quotes.quote: I haven't been given many things, but I've been given ample, limitless patience
en_quotes.author: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

en_quotes.quote: Patience is weapon. I learned that from my Laker days
en_quotes.author: Metta World Peace

en_quotes.quote: When you have a president who mocks our inclusivity, who demonizes our diversity... you can't ask for patience
en_quotes.author: Kevin de Leon

en_quotes.quote: I have learned that you need to have patience, perseverance, and faith in people to reach your goals
en_quotes.author: Richarlison

en_quotes.quote: I believe there's too little patience and context to many of the investigations I read or see on television
en_quotes.author: Bob Woodward

en_quotes.quote: That's why I never became a director. I never had patience with people
en_quotes.author: Ray Harryhausen

en_quotes.quote: Business is a sprint until you find an opportunity, then it's the patience of a marathon runner
en_quotes.author: Robert Herjavec

en_quotes.quote: I've always been a person with patience, and I don't like to force things
en_quotes.author: Harry Shum, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Patience is passion tamed
en_quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

en_quotes.quote: I don't have a lot of patience for boring arthouse movies
en_quotes.author: Zoe Kazan

en_quotes.quote: I think there's not much patience for organized labour, period, public or private sector
en_quotes.author: Kathleen Wynne

en_quotes.quote: Coaching takes patience. I'm more enthused when teaching players who want it versus when I have to
en_quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

en_quotes.quote: He preacheth patience that never knew pain
en_quotes.author: Henry George Bohn

en_quotes.quote: Patience was not something that came naturally to me, but in cooking it is the quintessential skill
en_quotes.author: Gail Simmons

en_quotes.quote: I'm terrible with patience
en_quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

en_quotes.quote: This is the story of what a Woman's patience can endure, and what a Man's resolution can achieve
en_quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

en_quotes.quote: Pregnancy has been a huge lesson in patience and in allowing myself to be open to whatever the day may hand me
en_quotes.author: Anna Kaiser

en_quotes.quote: I don't have much patience with sick people
en_quotes.author: Maura Tierney

en_quotes.quote: I don't think patience is something that any of us grow up with in a large dose. It's a world of instant gratification
en_quotes.author: Tim Cope

en_quotes.quote: I had no patience for films. It was only after I met Shah Rukh that I learnt to enjoy his passion for cinema
en_quotes.author: Gauri Khan

en_quotes.quote: I have no patience for homophobia
en_quotes.author: Dan Levy

en_quotes.quote: I have an equal amount of patience as my grade-school children, which is not great
en_quotes.author: Mike D

en_quotes.quote: I tell people all the time, the status quo is so untenable to me. Like, literally, I have no patience for it
en_quotes.author: Michael Tubbs

en_quotes.quote: The patience of the American public with dilatory diplomatic delays will be very limited
en_quotes.author: Tom Lantos

en_quotes.quote: Being a runner has brought me a lot of patience, and patience goes a long way in life
en_quotes.author: Tori Bowie

en_quotes.quote: In this day and age, you need a lot of patience if you are in the movie business
en_quotes.author: Brett Ratner

en_quotes.quote: I've said my patience is not infinite
en_quotes.author: Darrell Issa

en_quotes.quote: Is the patience of the American people that long suffering? Is there no outrage left in the country?
en_quotes.author: Andrew Greeley

en_quotes.quote: I have very little patience with children
en_quotes.author: Mem Fox

en_quotes.quote: When it comes to work, I have a lot of patience, but otherwise, I am quite impatient
en_quotes.author: Kratika Sengar

en_quotes.quote: I haven't got a lot of patience
en_quotes.author: Jeffrey Katzenberg

en_quotes.quote: I wish I was a shredder that could play everything, but I don't have the patience
en_quotes.author: Dave Navarro

en_quotes.quote: A career in showbiz is like a distance run. You have to have patience and pace yourself
en_quotes.author: Tate Donovan

en_quotes.quote: Constant repetition of tongue-twisters was like lifting weights for me, but patience and persistence have paid off
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Brendon

en_quotes.quote: Patience has never been my strong suit
en_quotes.author: Michael Chiklis

en_quotes.quote: Kids teach you a lot of patience
en_quotes.author: Mona Singh

en_quotes.quote: Everything is out there if you know how to find it, and have the patience. I don't and haven't, but that's my problem
en_quotes.author: Tom Holt

en_quotes.quote: Difficult years lie ahead, patience is required
en_quotes.author: Yiannis Stournaras

en_quotes.quote: A philosopher goes where the truth leads and has no patience with mere emotion
en_quotes.author: John C. Wright

en_quotes.quote: If you have confidence you have patience. Confidence, that is everything
en_quotes.author: Ilie Nastase

en_quotes.quote: I've done an awful lot of stuff that's a monument to public patience
en_quotes.author: Tyrone Power

en_quotes.quote: Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: First they ignore you. Then they laugh at you. Then they fight you. Then you win.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Patience and fortitude conquer all things.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Most men pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that they hurry past it.
en_quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: Just keep going when it’s tough. Just keep going when it’s long.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: A man who is a master of patience is master of everything else.
en_quotes.author: George Savile

en_quotes.quote: Patience is not passive, on the contrary, it is concentrated strength.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: You usually have to wait for that which is worth waiting for.
en_quotes.author: Craig Bruce

en_quotes.quote: When you have self-knowledge, you’re naturally calm and poised. You overcome obstacles with ease. They are part of your plan.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: Our patience will achieve more than our force.
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance.
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: Maybe that’s why life is so precious. No rewind or fast forward… just patience and faith.
en_quotes.author: Cristina Marrero

en_quotes.quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: All human wisdom is summed up in two words – wait and hope.
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Don’t cross the bridge until you come to it.
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: Make your ego porous. Will is of little importance, complaining is nothing, fame is nothing. Openness, patience, receptivity, solitude is everything.
en_quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

en_quotes.quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
en_quotes.author: A.A. Milne

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the key to paradise.
en_quotes.author: Turkish proverb

en_quotes.quote: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
en_quotes.author: Molière

en_quotes.quote: Slow and steady wins the race
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the key to contentment.
en_quotes.author: The Prophet Muhammad

en_quotes.quote: Everything that slows us down and forces patience, everything that sets us back into the slow circles of nature, is a help.
en_quotes.author: May Sarton

en_quotes.quote: Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
en_quotes.author: Molière

en_quotes.quote: One moment of patience may ward off great disaster. One moment of impatience may ruin a whole life.
en_quotes.author: Chinese proverb

en_quotes.quote: Never cut a tree down in the wintertime. Never make a negative decision in the low time. Never make your most important decisions when you are in your worst moods. Wait. Be patient. The storm will pass. The spring will come.
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: At the gate of patience there is no crowding.
en_quotes.author: Moroccan saying

en_quotes.quote: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
en_quotes.author: Sivananda Saraswati

en_quotes.quote: Teach us, O Lord, the disciplines of patience, for to wait is often harder than to work.
en_quotes.author: Peter Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Change is slow and gradual. It requires hard work, a bit of luck, a fair amount of self-sacrifice, and a lot of patience.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Who ever is out of patience is out of possession of their soul.
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Have patience with all things but first of all with yourself.
en_quotes.author: Francis de Sales

en_quotes.quote: No great thing is created suddenly.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: To lose patience is to lose the battle.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Don’t put the cart before the horse.
en_quotes.author: John Heywood

en_quotes.quote: Patience and the passage of time do more than strength and fury.
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free.
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: Genius is eternal patience.
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

en_quotes.quote: All we need is just a little patience.
en_quotes.author: Gun’s And Roses

en_quotes.quote: Never put passion before principle, even if you win, you’ll lose.
en_quotes.author: Mr. Miyagi

en_quotes.quote: Patience you must have, my young padawan
en_quotes.author: Yoda (Star Wars)

en_quotes.quote: The very important thing you should have is patience.
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma (Alibaba)

en_quotes.quote: ll good things come to he who waits.
en_quotes.author: Proverb

en_quotes.quote: Better a patient person than a warrior, one with self-control than one who takes a city
en_quotes.author: Proverbs

en_quotes.quote: Keep doing your Karm (work). Don’t start expecting the results.
en_quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

en_quotes.quote: Judge a tree from its fruit, not from its leaves.
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Haste is productive of injury, and so is too much hesitation. He is the wisest man who does everything at the proper time.
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Keep silence for the most part, and speak only when you must, and then briefly.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Time heals what reason cannot.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: We should always allow some time to elapse, for time discloses the truth.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: What was hard to suffer is sweet to remember.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Once you learn patience, your options suddenly expand.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Always seem patient, as if you know that everything will come to you eventually.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: No pain that we suffer, no trial that we experience is wasted. It ministers to our education, to the development of such qualities as patience, faith, fortitude and humility.
en_quotes.author: Orson F. Whitney

en_quotes.quote: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
All things come to him who waits – provided he knows what he is waiting for.
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the calm acceptance that things can happen in a different order than the one you have in mind.
en_quotes.author: David G. Allen

en_quotes.quote: Patience and wisdom walk hand in hand, like two one-armed lovers.
en_quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

en_quotes.quote: Patience earns interest. Impatience pays interest.
en_quotes.author: Jack Butcher

en_quotes.quote: What can you control? Your efforts and where you apply your efforts. What can’t you control? Results. Let them go. Believe.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: And sure enough, even waiting will end… if you can just wait long enough.
en_quotes.author: William Faulkner

en_quotes.quote: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown.
en_quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: In any contest between power and patience, bet on patience.
en_quotes.author: W.B. Prescott

en_quotes.quote: What may not be altered is made lighter by patience.
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: The salt of patience seasons everything.
en_quotes.author: Italian saying

en_quotes.quote: Patience is not a virtue. It is an achievement.
en_quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the master key to every situation. One must have sympathy for everything, surrender to everything, but at the same time remain patient and forbearing.
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: Patience, a willingness to completely surrender to the process, and the importance of listening.
Successful people know the difference between patience and procrastination.
A leaf that is destined to grow large is full of grooves and wrinkles at the start. Now if one has no patience and wants it smooth offhand like a willow leaf, there is trouble ahead.
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: All commend patience, but none can endure to suffer.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: The whole duty of man is embraced in the two principles of abstinence and patience: temperance in prosperity, and patient courage in adversity.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.
en_quotes.author: Hal Borland

en_quotes.quote: Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience.
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: Many a man thinks he is patient when, in reality, he is indifferent.
en_quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: Who is happy? The man with low expectations. Who is successful? The man with high expectations. Who is wise? The man with patience.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength.
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence.
en_quotes.author: Hal Borland

en_quotes.quote: The test of good manners is to be patient with the bad ones.
en_quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

en_quotes.quote: All men are made one for another: either then teach them better or bear with them.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: The continuous drip polishes the stone.
en_quotes.author: Peruvian saying

en_quotes.quote: My son, observe the postage stamp! Its usefulness depends upon its ability to stick to one thing until it gets there.
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: The secret engine fueling success is patience. It will actually get you to most goals much quicker and smoother than the alternative.
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: You will get there when you are meant to get there and not moment sooner. So relax, breathe, and be patient.
Don’t chase, don’t beg, don’t stress, don’t be desperate, just relax. When you relax, it will come to you. Make your wants, want you.
If you should put even a little on a little and should do this often, soon this would become big.
en_quotes.author: Hesiod

en_quotes.quote: Trust the process. Your time is coming. Just do the work and the results will handle themselves
en_quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

en_quotes.quote: Because you are alive, everything is possible.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: If you want a more patient world, let patience be your motto.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: Grain by grain a loaf, stone by stone, a castle.
en_quotes.author: Yugoslavian saying

en_quotes.quote: Your mastery depends on focus, patience and practice. Not on luck.
en_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes things aren’t clear right away. That’s where you need to be patient and persevere and see where things lead.
en_quotes.author: Mary Pierce

en_quotes.quote: It will be your toughest battle. It will be the only one worth it.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: Be a lamp for yourselves. Be your own refuge. Seek for no other. All things must pass. Strive on diligently. Don’t give up.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Patience is more important to success than brilliance.
en_quotes.author: Shane Parrish

en_quotes.quote: Take up an idea, devote yourself to it, struggle on in patience, and the sun will rise for you.
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: Genius is nothing but a great aptitude for patience.
en_quotes.author: George-Louis de Buffon

en_quotes.quote: Misfortune is the test of a person’s merit.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
en_quotes.author: Saadi

en_quotes.quote: Time discovers truth
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: While we wait for life, life passes.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Endurance is patience concentrated.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Patience isn’t a virtue; it’s a necessity
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: Patience is a conquering virtue.
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

en_quotes.quote: Patience in all things is your crucial shield.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Bear and forbear.
A man who masters patience masters everything else.
What comes easy won’t last. What lasts won’t come easy.
You can’t rush something you want to last forever.
Genius is patience.
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: Patience is a fruit of the spirit that grows only under trial.
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: All great achievements require time.
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: The greatest power is often simple patience.
en_quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the best medicine
en_quotes.author: John Florio

en_quotes.quote: Time is the wisest of all counselors.
en_quotes.author: Plutarch

en_quotes.quote: Intuition is a suspension of logic due to impatience.
en_quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

en_quotes.quote: Haste makes waste.
en_quotes.author: John Heywood

en_quotes.quote: Be impatient with actions but patient with results.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Patience is a key element of success
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: Nothing else is necessary but these – love, sincerity, and patience.
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: Hard work combined with patience is a superpower.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: Slow is every foot on an unknown path.
en_quotes.author: Irish proverb

en_quotes.quote: One minute of patience, ten years of peace.
en_quotes.author: Greek proverb

en_quotes.quote: Haste has no blessing.
en_quotes.author: Swahili saying

en_quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Everything comes if a man will only wait.
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: How poor are they that have not patience! What wound did ever heal but by degrees?
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I am extraordinarily patient, provided I get my own way in the end.
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back.
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: He that can have patience can have what he will.
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: All good things come to he who waits.
en_quotes.author: Proverb

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
en_quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

en_quotes.quote: The very important thing you should have is patience.
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: Patience you must have, my young padawan.
en_quotes.author: Yoda

en_quotes.quote: Never put passion before principle, even if you win, you’ll lose.
en_quotes.author: Mr. Miyagi

en_quotes.quote: All we need is just a little patience.
en_quotes.author: Gun’s And Roses

en_quotes.quote: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

en_quotes.quote: Genius is eternal patience.
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free.
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: Patience and the passage of time do more than strength and fury.
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: Don’t put the cart before the horse.
en_quotes.author: John Heywood

en_quotes.quote: To lose patience is to lose the battle.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: No great thing is created suddenly.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Have patience with all things but first of all with yourself.
en_quotes.author: Francis de Sales

en_quotes.quote: Who ever is out of patience is out of possession of their soul.
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Change is slow and gradual. It requires hard work, a bit of luck, a fair amount of self-sacrifice, and a lot of patience.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Teach us, O Lord, the disciplines of patience, for to wait is often harder than to work.
en_quotes.author: Peter Marshall

en_quotes.quote: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
en_quotes.author: Sivananda Saraswati

en_quotes.quote: t the gate of patience there is no crowding.
en_quotes.author: Moroccan saying

en_quotes.quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: One moment of patience may ward off great disaster. One moment of impatience may ruin a whole life.
en_quotes.author: Chinese proverb

en_quotes.quote: Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
en_quotes.author: Molière

en_quotes.quote: Everything that slows us down and forces patience, everything that sets us back into the slow circles of nature, is a help.
en_quotes.author: May Sarton

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the key to contentment.
en_quotes.author: The Prophet Muhammad

en_quotes.quote: Slow and steady wins the race.
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
en_quotes.author: Molière

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the key to paradise.
en_quotes.author: Turkish proverb

en_quotes.quote: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
en_quotes.author: A.A. Milne

en_quotes.quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Make your ego porous. Will is of little importance, complaining is nothing, fame is nothing. Openness, patience, receptivity, solitude is everything.
en_quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

en_quotes.quote: Don’t cross the bridge until you come to it.
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: All human wisdom is summed up in two words – wait and hope
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: Maybe that’s why life is so precious. No rewind or fast forward… just patience and faith.
en_quotes.author: Cristina Marrero

en_quotes.quote: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance.
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: Our patience will achieve more than our force.
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: When you have self-knowledge, you’re naturally calm and poised. You overcome obstacles with ease. They are part of your plan.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: You usually have to wait for that which is worth waiting for.
en_quotes.author: Craig Bruce

en_quotes.quote: Patience is not passive, on the contrary, it is concentrated strength.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: A man who is a master of patience is master of everything else.
en_quotes.author: George Savile

en_quotes.quote: Just keep going when it’s tough. Just keep going when it’s long.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: Most men pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that they hurry past it.
en_quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: Patience and fortitude conquer all things.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: First they ignore you. Then they laugh at you. Then they fight you. Then you win.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
en_quotes.author: Ovid
